thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Jane
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Jane

author: Jane
title: Jane
text: My first ever Pack & Send experience, I spoke to my local outlet on the phone and also in person when I dropped off the package and both times they were very helpful and friendly. The online booking service was really easy to navigate and use. I thought the charge was very reasonable and the delivery happened faster than the timeframe that was given. (Of course I wouldn't expect faster delivery every time but thought it worth mentioning as a bonus.)
